reviewText: A wide variety of musical styles and nature views, but none spectacular.  Better to focus your money on styles and views you prefer.

I first saw "A view from Space" and "A Guitarscape Planet" and was impressed by both. I wanted to see "New Orleans Concert" and "Nature's Colors" and chose to buy the Blu-Ray starter set. It is definitley worth the money and Blu-Ray enhances each of these experiences. I would highly reccomend it!
